content.raw:
Thank you! Looks great and seems to work, although I should think of some proper tests.

Do you think we can/should get rid of the iterator argument in all `map()` methods now? We discussed previously that it’s kind of wrong; the only legitimate case for multiple iterators on one parser that I can think of is for XML parsers and iteration on different tags, which is now taken care of.
content.html:
Thank you! Looks great and seems to work, although I should think of some proper tests.

Do you think we can/should get rid of the iterator argument in all map() methods now? We discussed previously that it’s kind of wrong; the only legitimate case for multiple iterators on one parser that I can think of is for XML parsers and iteration on different tags, which is now taken care of.
